 Theme Dark Mode Customize SOS Button Restore Defaults About SOS Alert Application Welcome to the SOS Alert App - your personal safety companion!

With a single press of the SOS button, notify your emergency contacts and nearby emergency services in seconds. Features:
- One-tap SOS alert notifications and calls.
- Customizable contact list and SOS button styles.
- Multi-language support for a global audience.
- Dark and light theme customization.
- A 10-second countdown to cancel accidental alerts. How to Use:
1. Set up your emergency contacts in the Settings page.
2. Press the SOS button in an emergency.
3. Use the 10-second timer to cancel if needed. Contact Us:
Email: support@example.com
Phone: +123-456-7890 Version: 1.0.0
Privacy Policy: Your data is secure. Read our full policy [here]. about
